meanings.definition: Pursued in order to catch or catch up with.
meanings.sent1: The dog chased the ball in the park.
meanings.sent2: The police officer chased the thief down the street.
meanings.sent3: The children chased each other in a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: Time chased us as we tried to finish our project before the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The wind chased the leaves across the yard.

meanings.definition: Decorated with a pattern of indentations or incised lines.
